caption.p: Excision wound immediately after wounding and healing progress after application of the hydroalcoholic medicated extracts: A = Immediately after excision; B=Simple ointment, C = 10% w/w Brucea antidysentrica; D = 5% w/w Dodonaea angustifolia; E = 10% w/w Rhamnus Prinoides; F = 10% w/w Dodonaea angustifolia; G = Standard (0.2% Nitrofurazone ointment).
